SEARCH
Package container

Class ApplicationList

java.lang.Object
container.ApplicationList
public class ApplicationList extends Object
Manages the list of applications in the system. Supports operations such as adding, removing, filtering by project or status, and persisting application data via CSV.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicationList(String filepath, ApplicantList applicantList, ProjectList projectList)
    Constructs an ApplicationList and loads data from a CSV file.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationList

      public ApplicationList(String filepath, ApplicantList applicantList, ProjectList projectList)
      Constructs an ApplicationList and loads data from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the file path to load application data from
      applicantList - reference to the list of all applicants
      projectList - reference to the list of all projects

  • Method Details

    • addApplication

      public void addApplication(Application application)
      Adds a new application to the list.
      Parameters:
      application - the application to add

    • removeApplication

      public void removeApplication(Application application)
      Removes an existing application from the list.
      Parameters:
      application - the application to remove

    • getApplicationList

      public ArrayList<Application> getApplicationList()
      Returns the full list of applications.
      Returns:
      list of Application

    • getApplicationByApplicant

      public Application getApplicationByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Retrieves the application submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant to search for
      Returns:
      the matching Application, or null if none found

    • getApplicationsByProject

      public ArrayList<Application> getApplicationsByProject(Project project)
      Retrieves all applications submitted for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of matching applications

    • getPendingApplicationsByProject

      public ArrayList<Application> getPendingApplicationsByProject(Project project)
      Returns all pending applications for a given project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to filter by
      Returns:
      list of pending applications

    • removeApplicationsByProject

      public void removeApplicationsByProject(Project project)
      Removes all applications tied to a specific project. Also clears any references held by the applicants.
      Parameters:
      project - the project whose applications should be removed

    • getSuccessfulApplications

      public ArrayList<Application> getSuccessfulApplications()
      Returns a list of all successful applications.
      Returns:
      list of applications with status SUCCESSFUL

    • saveToCSV

      public void saveToCSV()
      Saves the current state of the application list to a CSV file. The file includes the applicant NRIC, project name, and application status.
